question: Do you support the government accepting more refugees fleeing war or persecution? Please answer briefly in 2–3 sentences.

comments.comment: I am pretty conflicted, but I think overall I think its okay to accept refugees fleeing war or persecution. I know if I was in their shoes, I would want somewhere safe to go.
Yes I support the US government accepting more refugees who are fleeing persecution that would result in harm including loss of life
I do support the government accepting more refugees because they are people who didn’t choose to live that war, people who is trying to have a better life for them and their families

I believe the government should accept refugees fleeing dangerous situations. However, the qualifications for what justifies refugee status should be thoroughly vetted. There should also be limits in place so that citizens do not experience negative effects on their quality of life.

I find that I do support the government doing this. The reason being is that why have an abundance of resources if you are not using it.
